sections.heading: Short title. This Act may be cited as the Roadside Memorial Act.
sections.text: Short title. This Act may be cited as the Roadside Memorial Act.

sections.heading: Purpose of the Roadside Memorial program
sections.text: The Roadside Memorial program is intended to raise public awareness of traffic fatalities by affording families an opportunity to remember the victims of traffic crashes.

sections.heading: Definitions. As used in this Act:
sections.text: Definitions. As used in this Act:

sections.heading: Participation in the Roadside Memorial program.
sections.text: Participation in the Roadside Memorial program.

sections.heading: Rules.   The Department shall adopt rules regarding implementation of this Act
sections.text: These rules shall be consistent with this Act and with federal regulations.

sections.heading: Effective date. This Act takes effect January 1, 2008.
sections.text: Effective date. This Act takes effect January 1, 2008.
